member.name: X3DAUDIO_DISTANCE_CURVE
member.summary: Defines an explicit piecewise curve made up of linear segments, directly defining DSP behavior with respect to normalized distance.

member.name: X3DAUDIO_DISTANCE_CURVE.pPoints
member.summary: array. The array must have no duplicates and be sorted in ascending order with respect to distance.

member.name: X3DAUDIO_DISTANCE_CURVE.PointCount
member.summary: Number of distance curve points. There must be two or more points since all curves must have at least two endpoints defining values at 0.0f and 1.0f normalized distance, respectively.
